QuestData.Title: Bidden to Greatness
QuestData.Description: It is up to all of you to remove the thorn from the side of Shen-zin Su. Do not let your differences come between you. Trust in each other.$B$BWithin the Pei-Wu Forest is a lone hermit. Head directly to his hut. He knows intimately of the dark things that now lurk in the trees.
QuestData.LogDescription: Open the gates to Pei-Wu Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Evil is rising from the seas and filling the forest. It's not just tigers anymore... something far more sinister lurks in the shadows, waiting to take any pandaren unwise enough to stray out alone.$B$BYou are not safe here.
